data.system_settings: ipad mini 4 with ios 10.3.2 and my trusty little iphone 5c with ios 10.3.3
data.actual_result: the two options look invisible as they blend with the light mode colour.
data.expected_result: black text should appear with the two options: 'roles' and 'done'
data.steps_to_repro: - get light mode, go on your server's settngs - manage your roles, press on a role - edit permissions from that role, the 'roles' and 'done' buttons blend with the white from the light mode and are hard to find
